title: Carlo Ancelotti - Wikipedia
snippet: With his team's 2â€“1 victory over Real Sociedad on 17 September 2023, Ancelotti got his 173rd Madrid win, overtaking Zinedine Zidane to become the coach with the second most wins in the club's history. On 29 December, although he had previously been linked with the position of head coach for the Brazil national football team, Real Madrid announced that Ancelotti had agreed to a contract extension until 30 June 2026.

title: List of Real Madrid CF managers - Wikipedia
snippet: The most successful coach with Real Madrid is Carlo Ancelotti, as won 15 titles with the team.
